attributes.title: Very bad
attributes.review: This app made my bed fly away to China and now I can’t go get it! And I can’t leave my house because I’m in quarantine! So how do I get a another BED!!

attributes.title: worst app to ever exist
attributes.review: this app is full of fake news and never says the truth the creator must be really mentally ill since the format is horrendous and could be created better by my 2 year old daughter as a republican it is a disgrace to have such a horrible app for a disgrace of out president i would give it 0 stars i would

attributes.title: i am being threatened
attributes.review: this app keeps sending me notifications that say “eat glass” “lick rust” and “drink gasoline”. i will NOT stand for this😡 if i eated soap. i don’t eat it bc i did. no i didn’t💔

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: Do not install unless you want your system to be slowed down. My internet was consumed at extreme amounts. The app itself is messy and unorganized. It’s hard to navigate.

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: I almost chocked on my chicken nuggets while looking at this app after I downloaded it this app needs to be removed off the App Store TRUMP IS A 🤡

attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: The format of this app is awful, it’s always laggy and slow. And the worst part- this ugly guy with orange skin and pouty lips is all over it! I can’t stand it anymore!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This is the dumbest app I’ve ever seen in my life. It’s useless and so is the owner/creator of the app. No one should ever have to download this app and deal with this ever again!!!

attributes.title: Absolute garbage
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it didn’t even teleport me to the White House cause I wanted to make pancakes today but I thought about that tomorrow but TikTok yea.....

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: My phone immediately shut down after downloading this app then the fbi came and told me that’s illegal

attributes.title: Horrible
